job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Senior Consultant
job.description: <p>-&nbsp;Experience with building and deploying ML-based solutions and proficiency in common machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn, Pytorch and ONNX</p><p>- Experience with designing, building, and maintaining production-grade ML and DL models, machine learning workflows and pipelines</p><p>- Experience with deploying ML Solutions on AWS / GCP or Azure cloud platforms and exposure to cloud services necessary to build end to end pipeline</p><p>- Relevant consulting or industry experience. Travel involved.</p><p><br></p><p>Limited immigration sponsorship may be available</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;Locations - New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, Boston etc.</p>
